Everyone's hearing of his stupid comment in his speech he gave in California that's causing an uproar:
 "you study hard, you do your homework and you make an effort to be smart, you can do well. And if you don't, you get stuck in Iraq" 
 Should Kerry need to apologize to soldiers for this, as both Republicans AND more and more Democrats are calling for?
Yeah, John Kerry should apologize for being so damned obtuse and not explaining that he was talking about our idiotic, stupid president who got us stuck in Iraq, not about our troops.
Actually, I think he's telling the truth it was simply a joke that was mis-spoken. He's apologized now, so the matter should be closed. I doubt it will go away, though.
Kerry issued a letter of apology today.
No. He has nothing to aplogise for.

No. He has nothing to aplogise for.

 
 Exactly. What has he done wrong?
It was funny but we probably shouldn't care too much. It happens, Bush does things like that and people are just as unforgiving.
